feature_1.desc: Track student progress, manage enrollments, and schedule classes.

feature_2.title: Automated Invoicing

feature_3.title: Reports and Analytics

feature_4.title: Calendar Integration
feature_4.desc: Sync schedules with popular calendars like Google Calendar.

sectionTitle.subtitle: FAQ
sectionTitle.title: Any Questions? Answered
sectionTitle.paragraph: Here are answers to the most frequently asked questions about our services. If you don't find the answer here, please contact us.

question_1.question: What services does your platform offer?
question_1.answer: Our platform provides comprehensive tools for managing a driving school, including lesson booking, student progress tracking, schedule management, and instructor communication.

question_2.question: Can I customize the features to fit my driving school's needs?
question_2.answer: Yes, our software is flexible and can be tailored to the specific needs of your driving school.

question_3.question: Does the platform support online payments?
question_3.answer: Yes, our platform supports online payments, making it easier to manage course fees.

question_4.question: How can I track my students' progress?
question_4.answer: Our platform offers tools for tracking student progress, including performance reports and attendance analytics.

question_5.question: Can I integrate the schedule with my calendar?
question_5.answer: Yes, our platform allows for synchronization with popular calendars, such as Google Calendar.

question_6.question: Is your platform GDPR compliant?
question_6.answer: Yes, our software is GDPR compliant, ensuring the security of user personal data.
